title: Sparkling swimming pool, Fully furnished apartments, Storage Units
posting_body: ['MLK Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Close to shopping', '-Large two bedroom apartments', '-Large studio apartments', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-No long term lease required', '-Easy freeway access', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Laundry facilities', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Storage Units', '-Free premium cable TV', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
